author: Joshua Fluke
description:
Check out the Libernovo Omni Chair Here! - https://libernovo.com/?ref=uwgbamjg

If you’ve ever looked at your company’s “culture” and thought… this feels weirdly familiar, congratulations — you might already be in a corporate cult. Except this one doesn’t even give you matching sneakers or a secret handshake. Just a hoodie, a Slack channel, and 16-hour workdays.

LinkedIn CEOs have officially stopped pretending.
They’re not accidentally sounding culty anymore — they’re openly telling you the quiet part out loud:

“Turn your team into a cult.”
“You must believe the same principles at all times.”
“If someone disagrees, fire them in 2 weeks.”

Meanwhile the salary?
$110K to live in San Francisco and work 16 hours a day.
Congratulations — your true hourly rate is $26/hr and your fun money is $25 a day.
Even the Kool-Aid is out of budget.

🔥 Need a resume/cover letter? Check out my templates!  
https://www.joshuafluke.store/

👊 Join the community! 
https://discord.gg/Joshuafluke

Socials🤳
title: CEOS ON LINKEDIN ARE A CULT!

Resume advice is usually watered-down, outdated, and delivered by someone who hasn’t applied for a job since dial-up internet. So today, we’re going over the taboo resume advice your career counselor will never tell you.

We’re talking about the stuff that actually gets your resume thrown out — full addresses, graduation years, “14+ years of experience,” irrelevant hobbies, two-page novels, vague bullet points, and keyword sections that belong in witness protection. I’m breaking down real (blurred) resumes and showing exactly wh
title: TABOO RESUME ADVICE - WHAT YOU NEED TO KNOW!
